General.Name: Jiangsu Yanghe Brewery Joint-Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Yanghe Brewery Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. offers liquors, wines, spirits, and cocktails. It offers its products primarily under the Yanghe and Shuanggou brands. Jiangsu Yanghe Brewery Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Suqian, China.
